data.text: We had very bad welcome during check IN as the staff and even the manager was very rude the way they spoke to me, nowhere while booking or in their website or anywhere it was mentioned that refundable security deposit is needed but they were adamant on it. Didn't have any empathy or showed any decency. For a 4 star hotel I expect them to show some respect and loyalty towards customer.
data.title: Rude Manager & Receptionist

data.text: Arriving late, we were pleasantly surprised with a room upgrade, which added to the enjoyment of our stay. The attentive staff catered to our needs exceptionally well, and the hotel's location, just a short stroll away from Burjaman Mall and street shops, was perfect.
data.title: "Exceptional Stay: A Review of Grayton Hotel - Upgrade, Attentive Staff, and Ideal Location"

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Guest, thank you for taking the time to post your review of the Grayton Hotel. It gives me great pleasure to read such wonderful comments and I am delighted that you had such a memorable experience. Suffice it to say that our team will be chuffed with your compliments on the quality, of our Service. I look forward to, hopefully, having the opportunity to welcome you back again soon. Yours sincerely, Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Soukaina Ennhari

data.text: We spend quality time in this hotel . Food was nice ,rooms are clean and nice , and frist impression of the hotel is smiling staffs & very helpful Mr Saroj who helps us to checking in also help with our luggages …………….I would like to give special complements to him that he look handsome ,always smiling and also ready for help ☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️ ……good job thanks see u again ☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️…………definitely suggest to all .once again thank to Saroj ,wasim and Rimas ☺️☺️☺️☺️☺️
data.title: Good

data.text:
I have enjoyed my staying at Grayton hotel. The staff and particularly Soukaina have been very welcoming and helpful. Great location close to the metro and with a parking if you have a car. The breakfast is also very good with a lot of choice.
I recommend this hotel!
data.title: Very good hotel in Dubai!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Guest, thank you for taking the time to post your review of the Grayton Hotel. It gives me great pleasure to read such wonderful comments and I am delighted that you had such a memorable experience. data.text:
Amazing Service and Amazing food. 
Visited Bukhara with my family as I am a Big fan Indian cuisine.

From arrival to the departure I was treated with utmost respect and professionalism.

The service provided by Ehtisham was second to none. Chef Ballwinder was amazing too, coming out of the kitchen talking to guest was making it more lively and building trust in people . 

Been to Bukhara in Delhi and Ajman and found the same taste and better service at Grayson ,will definitely come back soon.

Shiv singh even came to meet me after his duty hours, this is the passion what we are missing in todays generation. Shiv toy are training your team well and leading by example.  Good job Keep it up .
data.title: Hidden treasure of Indian Cuisine with Ultra attentive Service
